content: upgrade your art wall with this gorgeous doily design just one ball of it s a wrap rainbow and you ll be on your way to a uniquely stylish piece of art that celebrates your love of yarn and art dream catcher measures about 34 when attached to hula hoop **materials needed** * red heart® it s a wrap rainbow™ 1 cake 9347 whisper * susan bates® crochet hook 3 25 mm us d-3 * 34 86 5 cm hula hoop yarn needle * optional materials 9 yds 8 2 m of 2½ 6 3 cm wide ribbon hot glue gun and glue to cover hula hoop
